name: Hearts of Palm Dip
author: AKAMPERSCHROER
summary: This is a rich dip, and easy to make! Serve with water crackers, as you want to taste all the goodies in the dip. A good variation from the same old artichoke dip.
ingredients: 1 (14.25 ounce) can hearts of palm, drained and chopped
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Lightly grease a glass pie plate
In a medium bowl, mix together the hearts of palm, mozzarella cheese, Parmesan cheese, green onion, sour cream and mayonnaise
Spread into the greased pie plate
Bake uncovered for 20 minutes, or until light brown and bubbly
Serve with crackers or Melba rounds
